item.title: [Pi] Teleport help [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, I needed to add some new teleports to my server. I needed to add the teleports to the lumbridge teleport so I added this in my ClickingButtons.java.

		case 9190:
			[size=24pt]if (c.teleAction == 1) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2676,3715,0);[/size]
			} else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
				//barrows
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3565, 3314, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 3) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3488, 9493, 0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 5) {
				//mining
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3046,9779,0);
			} else if (c.teleAction == 20) {
				//lum
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3222, 3218, 0);//3222 3218
			}
			
			if (c.dialogueAction == 10) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2845, 4832, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2786, 4839, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2398, 4841, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			}
			break;
			case 988:
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3213,3457,0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			break;

I added that and I tested it out. Whenever I click the option that I added, it teleports me to barrows, barrows is the teleaction 2, why won’t it tele me to rock crabs?

Read full topic
